snippet: The future of European club rugby was resolved with a new elite competition replacing the Heineken Cup, ending a dispute that rumbled on nearly two years.
lead_paragraph: The future of European club rugby was resolved with a new elite competition replacing the Heineken Cup, ending a dispute that rumbled on nearly two years.

headline.main: New European Cup Format Ends Long-Running Rugby Dispute
headline.print_headline: New European Cup Format Ends Long-Running Rugby Dispute
